meta.description: CHAIN TEMPLATES - Pre-built investigation workflows using valid operators

genre_chains._description: Chains for each EDITH report genre - maps sections to operator sequences

chains.syntax: "{company}" insolvency OR bankruptcy OR liquidation site:jur
brute{"{company}"} fraud OR scandal OR investigation news!
brute{"{person}"} politician OR minister OR government OR parliament
brute{"{person}"} fraud OR scandal OR arrest OR charged news!
brute{"{person}"} site:twitter.com OR site:facebook.com OR site:instagram.com
brute{"{person}"} wife OR husband OR son OR daughter OR brother
brute{"subject"} site:faa.gov OR site:caa.co.uk OR site:imo.org
brute{"subject"} site:ipo.gov.uk OR site:uspto.gov OR site:wipo.int patent OR trademark
brute{"subject"} investment OR fund OR capital OR shares
brute{"subject"} yacht OR mansion OR jet OR luxury OR art collection
brute{"subject"} trust OR offshore OR nominee OR asset protection
brute{"{person}"} OR "{person}" politician OR minister OR government
brute{"{company}"} OR "{person}" funding OR investment OR revenue source
brute{"{company}"} OR "{person}" fraud OR bribery OR corruption OR money laundering news!
brute{"{person}"} politician OR minister OR MP OR senator OR government official
brute{"{person}"} wife OR husband OR son OR daughter politician
brute{"subject"} judgment OR verdict site:bailii.org OR site:caselaw
brute{"subject"} enforcement OR fine OR penalty site:regulator
lit{jur}: {company} => brute{"{company}"} lawsuit OR claim OR dispute
brute{"{company}"} site:ipo.gov.uk OR site:uspto.gov OR site:epo.org patent trademark
brute{"{company}"} contract OR agreement OR partnership site:{domain} filetype:pdf
brute{"subject"} trust OR offshore OR nominee OR shell {company}
brute{"subject"} yacht OR mansion OR villa OR ferrari OR luxury
brute{"subject"} scandal OR fraud OR corruption OR bribery OR arrest news!
brute{"subject"} site:twitter.com OR site:facebook.com OR site:reddit.com
brute{"subject"} environment OR climate OR pollution OR labor OR human rights
brute{"vendor"} labor OR environmental OR human rights violation
c{jur}: {company} => pdf! :!{domain} => brute{"{company}"} funding OR investment
p{jur}: => c? => bruteexit OR acquisition OR ipo
brute{"{company}"} competitor OR alternative OR versus
lit{jur}: counterparty => brute{"counterparty"} insolvency OR winding up
lit{jur}: executive => brute{"executive"} lawsuit OR sued OR defendant
sanctions? executive => brute{"executive"} politician OR government
p{jur}: subject => c? => p? => c? => handshake
brute{"subject"} Panama Papers OR Paradise Papers OR Pandora Papers OR offshore
brute{"subject"} scandal OR fraud OR investigation OR arrest news!
brute{"subject"} inheritance OR business sale OR ipo OR funding OR investment
brute{"subject"} site:linkedin.com CEO OR director OR founder
brute{"subject"} investor OR shareholder OR stake
p{jur}: subject => c? => brute{"subject"} Russia OR China OR Iran
lit{jur}: subject => brute{"subject"} bankruptcy OR debt OR ccj
brute{"partner"} joint venture OR partnership OR consortium
brute{"vendor"} review OR complaint OR customer
brute{"subject"} politician OR minister OR senator OR parliament OR government
brute{"subject"} donation OR contribution OR donor site:fec.gov OR site:electoralcommission
brute{"subject"} lobbying OR lobbyist OR government affairs
brute{"subject"} government contract OR procurement OR tender
brute{"{company}"} license OR permit OR authorization site:regulator
brute{"{company}"} enforcement OR fine OR penalty OR sanction site:regulator
brute{"subject"} controversy OR scandal OR criticism
brute{"{company}"} competitor OR alternative OR versus
pdf! :!{domain} governance OR compliance OR policy
brute{"{company}"} governance OR shareholder dispute OR board conflict
brute{"subject"} fraud OR bribery OR corruption OR money laundering

domain_chains._description: Domain and link analysis chains using LINKLATER operators

chains.name: Full Compliance Check
chains.syntax: sanctions? subject => reg{jur}: subject => lit{jur}: subject

chains.name: Regulatory History
chains.syntax: reg{jur}: subject => brute{"subject"} enforcement OR fine site:regulator

chains.name: Offshore Investigation
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} Panama Papers OR Paradise Papers OR Pandora Papers OR offshore OR BVI

chains.name: Financial Investigation
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => pdf! => brute{"{company}"} revenue OR profit OR funding

chains.name: Global Sanctions Check
chains.note: Checks OFAC, EU, UN, UK consolidated

chains.name: Jurisdiction Arbitrage
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:foreign_jur disclosure OR filing OR record

chains.name: Vehicle and Aircraft Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:faa.gov OR site:caa.co.uk OR site:eurocontrol

chains.name: Vessel Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:imo.org OR site:equasis.org OR yacht

chains.name: Intellectual Property Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:ipo.gov.uk OR site:uspto.gov OR site:wipo.int patent trademark

chains.name: Lifestyle Indicators
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} yacht OR mansion OR villa OR jet OR luxury OR collection

chains.name: Asset Concealment Indicators
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} trust OR offshore OR nominee OR shell {company} OR asset protection

chains.name: Adverse Media Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} scandal OR fraud OR corruption OR bribery OR arrest news!

chains.name: Social Media Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:twitter.com OR site:facebook.com OR site:linkedin.com

chains.name: Investigative Journalism Search
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:icij.org OR site:occrp.org OR investigation

chains.name: Person Full Reputation Profile
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} news! => brute{"{person}"} scandal OR fraud OR controversy => brute{"{person}"} award OR honor OR recognition

chains.name: Company Full Reputation Profile
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} news! => brute{"{company}"} scandal OR fraud OR lawsuit => brute{"{company}"} award OR ranking OR best

chains.name: Sentiment Analysis Chain
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} review OR rating OR complaint OR praise

chains.name: Crisis Detection Chain
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} crisis OR scandal OR controversy OR backlash OR viral news!

chains.name: Industry Standing Chain
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} leader OR pioneer OR innovator OR industry

chains.name: Person Full Online Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:linkedin.com => brute{"{person}"} site:twitter.com OR site:x.com => brute{"{person}"} site:facebook.com => brute{"{person}"} site:instagram.com => brute{"{person}"} site:github.com => brute{"{person}"} site:medium.com => brute{"{person}"} site:youtube.com

chains.name: Person Professional Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:linkedin.com => brute{"{person}"} site:xing.com => brute{"{person}"} site:crunchbase.com => p{jur}: {person}

chains.name: Person Social Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:twitter.com OR site:x.com => brute{"{person}"} site:facebook.com => brute{"{person}"} site:instagram.com => brute{"{person}"} site:tiktok.com => brute{"{person}"} site:threads.net

chains.name: Person Content Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:medium.com OR site:substack.com => brute{"{person}"} site:youtube.com OR site:vimeo.com => brute{"{person}"} site:slideshare.net OR site:speakerdeck.com => brute{"{person}"} podcast OR interview

chains.name: Person Technical Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:github.com => brute{"{person}"} site:stackoverflow.com => brute{"{person}"} site:gitlab.com => brute{"{person}"} site:npm.js.org OR site:pypi.org

chains.name: Person Academic Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} site:scholar.google.com => brute{"{person}"} site:researchgate.net => brute{"{person}"} site:academia.edu => brute{"{person}"} site:orcid.org

chains.name: Person Image Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} photo OR image OR picture

chains.name: Person Domain Footprint
chains.note: Check domains like firstname-lastname.com, firstnamelastname.com, etc.

chains.name: Company Social Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} site:linkedin.com => brute{"{company}"} site:twitter.com OR site:x.com => brute{"{company}"} site:facebook.com => brute{"{company}"} site:instagram.com => brute{"{company}"} site:youtube.com

chains.name: Company Review Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} site:glassdoor.com => brute{"{company}"} site:trustpilot.com => brute{"{company}"} site:g2.com => brute{"{company}"} site:capterra.com => brute{"{company}"} site:yelp.com

chains.name: Company Business Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} site:crunchbase.com => brute{"{company}"} site:bloomberg.com => brute{"{company}"} site:forbes.com => brute{"{company}"} site:dnb.com

chains.name: Company Tech Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} site:github.com => brute{"{company}"} site:stackoverflow.com => brute{"{company}"} site:builtwith.com

chains.name: Company Jobs Footprint
chains.syntax: brute{"{company}"} site:indeed.com => brute{"{company}"} site:linkedin.com/jobs => brute{"{company}"} site:glassdoor.com/job

chains.name: Person Companies via LinkedIn

chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} CEO OR founder OR director OR chairman {company}

chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => a? => c? => c{jur}: {company} => p? => c?

chains.name: Cryptocurrency Investigation

extended_investigation_chains._description: Complex multi-phase investigation workflows (8-15 steps) based on real report patterns

full_company_dd_workflow._description: Complete Company DD end-to-end (13 phases from EDITH COMPANY_DD)

chains.name: UK Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cuk: {company} => p? => puk: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => reguk: {company} => lituk: {company} => lituk: => lituk: => brute{"{company}"} insolvency OR bankruptcy uk! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} fraud OR scandal news! => ass{jur}: {company}

chains.name: German Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cde: {company} => p? => pde: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => regde: {company} => litde: {company} => litde: => litde: => brute{"{company}"} Insolvenz de! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} Betrug OR Skandal news! de! => assde: {company}

chains.name: French Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cfr: {company} => p? => pfr: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => regfr: {company} => litfr: {company} => brute{"{company}"} faillite OR liquidation fr! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} fraude OR scandale news! => assfr: {company}

chains.name: Dutch Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cnl: {company} => p? => pnl: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => regnl: {company} => litnl: {company} => brute{"{company}"} faillissement nl! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} fraude OR schandaal news! => assnl: {company}

chains.name: Swiss Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cch: {company} => p? => p{ch}: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => regch: {company} => brute{"{company}"} site:bger.ch OR site:admin.ch => brute{"{company}"} Konkurs ch! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} Betrug OR Skandal news! ch!

chains.name: Austrian Company DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: cat: {company} => p? => p{at}: => sanctions? => c? => p? => sanctions? => regat: {company} => brute{"{company}"} site:ris.bka.gv.at => brute{"{company}"} Insolvenz at! => pdf! :!{domain} => doc! :!{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => whois? :{domain} => brute{"{company}"} Betrug OR Skandal news! at!

full_person_dd_workflow._description: Complete Person DD end-to-end (11 phases from EDITH PERSON_DD)

chains.name: UK Person DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: puk: {person} => c? => cuk: => c? => p? => sanctions? {person} => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} site:linkedin.com => brute{"{person}"} politician OR minister OR MP gov! => lituk: {person} => brute{"{person}"} bankruptcy OR debt uk! => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR arrest OR charged news! => assuk: {person} => brute{"{person}"} site:twitter.com OR site:facebook.com

chains.name: German Person DD Complete Workflow
chains.syntax: pde: {person} => c? => cde: => c? => p? => sanctions? {person} => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} site:linkedin.com OR site:xing.com => brute{"{person}"} Politiker OR Bundesminister de! => litde: {person} => brute{"{person}"} Insolvenz de! => brute{"{person}"} Betrug OR Verhaftung news! de! => assde: {person}

chains.name: Global Person DD Multi-Jurisdiction
chains.syntax: puk: {person} => pde: {person} => pfr: {person} => pnl: {person} => p{at}: {person} => p{ch}: {person} => c? => cuk: => cde: => cfr: => p? => sanctions? {person} => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} site:linkedin.com => brute{"{person}"} politician OR minister gov! => lituk: {person} => litde: {person} => litfr: {person} => brute{"{person}"} bankruptcy OR insolvency => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR charged news! => assuk: {person} => assde: {person} => assfr: {person} => brute{"{person}"} site:twitter.com OR site:instagram.com => 2015-2025! :! => ent?

ubo_tracing_workflows._description: Deep beneficial ownership tracing (up to 5 layers)

chains.name: Full UBO Cascade Trace
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => p?25PCT => c? => c{jur}: => c? => p?25PCT => c? => c{jur}:3 => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} PEP OR politician

chains.name: Offshore UBO Trace (BVI, Cayman, Panama)
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => c? => brute{"{person}"} site:opencorporates.com => brute{"{person}"} Panama Papers OR Paradise Papers OR Pandora Papers => p? => sanctions? => puk: => pde: => c? => c{jur}:

chains.name: UBO Nominee Director Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => c? => =? => p? => c? => p? => sanctions? => puk:

chains.name: UBO Trust Structure Piercing
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => c? => brute{"{person}"} trustee OR settlor OR beneficiary => p? => sanctions? => puk: => brute{"{person}"} family office OR wealth => c?

shell_company_detection._description: Patterns for identifying shell company networks

chains.name: Shell Company Address Clustering
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => a? => c{jur}: => =? => p? => c? => a? => =? => c? => p? => sanctions?

chains.name: Formation Agent Shell Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => a? => brute{"{person}"} formation agent OR {company} secretary OR registered office => c? => c{jur}: => c? => p? => =? => c? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR investigation

chains.name: Dormant Shell Company Pattern
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => pdf! :!{domain} => =? => c? => c{jur}: => pdf! => =? _SHAREHOLDERS => p? => c? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR investigation

fraud_investigation_workflows._description: Multi-phase fraud and financial crime investigation patterns

chains.name: Full Corporate Fraud Investigation
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => p? => c? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR embezzlement OR theft => lituk: {company} => lituk: => brute{"{company}"} fraud OR investigation OR SEC OR FCA news! => c? => c{jur}: => lituk: => a? => c{jur}: => p? => =? => 2010-2025! :!{domain} => ent?

chains.name: Fraud Asset Tracing Investigation
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p{jur}: {person} => c? => ass{jur}: {person} => ass{jur}: => pdf! :! => brute{"{person}"} property OR real estate OR land => a? => c{jur}: => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} trust OR offshore => c? => brute{"{person}"} Panama Papers OR ICIJ => 2010-2025! :!

chains.name: Money Laundering Pattern Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => c? => c? => c{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} shell OR nominee => p? => c? => =? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} money laundering OR FATF => a? => =? => c?

chains.name: Invoice Fraud Scheme Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => c{jur}: => ?bl :! => p? => c? => =? => a? => =? => brute{"{person}"} invoice fraud OR carousel => sanctions? => lituk:

sanctions_evasion_detection._description: Patterns for detecting sanctions evasion and circumvention

chains.name: Sanctions Evasion via Ownership Layers
chains.syntax: sanctions? subject => c? => c? => p? => sanctions? => puk: => c? => c? => p?2_PERSONS => sanctions?2_PERSONS => =?

chains.name: Sanctions via Beneficial Ownership Chain
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => sanctions? => c? => c? => c? => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} Russia OR Belarus OR Iran => brute{"{person}"} oligarch OR sanctioned

chains.name: Sanctions Front Company Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => a? => p? => c? => c{jur}: => c? => p? => sanctions? => =? => c? => brute{"{person}"} procurement OR government contract => brute{"{person}"} dual-use OR export

chains.name: Sanctions Evasion via Family Members
chains.syntax: sanctions? {person} => brute{"{person}"} wife OR husband OR son OR daughter OR brother OR sister => p? => sanctions? => puk: => pde: => c? => c{jur}: => p? => c? => =? => brute{"{person}"} luxury OR yacht OR real estate OR art

chains.name: Sanctions Geographic Nexus Detection
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => a? => brute{"{person}"} Russia OR Belarus OR Iran OR Syria OR North Korea => c{jur}: => p? => sanctions? => c? => =? => brute{"{person}"} export OR dual-use OR military => sanctions?

asset_trace_deep_workflows._description: Deep asset tracing with multi-layer discovery

chains.name: Complete Individual Asset Trace
chains.syntax: p{jur}: {person} => c? => c{jur}: => c? => c? => ass{jur}: {person} => ass{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} yacht OR aircraft OR jet site:faa.gov OR site:caa.co.uk => brute{"{person}"} art collection OR auction site:christies.com OR site:sothebys.com => brute{"{person}"} patent OR trademark site:ipo.gov.uk OR site:wipo.int => ?bl :! => whois? : => c? => 2010-2025! :! => ent?

chains.name: Hidden Asset Ownership Trace
chains.syntax: p{jur}: {person} => c{jur}: => p? => ass{jur}: => c? => c{jur}: => c? => ass{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} trust OR nominee OR bearer shares => p? => c? => ass{jur}: => =?

chains.name: Deep Real Estate Asset Trace
chains.syntax: ass{jur}: subject => a? => c? => c{jur}: => p? => p? => ass{jur}: => ass{jur}: => a? => c? => =? => brute{"{person}"} renovation OR development OR planning

chains.name: IP Asset Portfolio Trace
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:ipo.gov.uk OR site:uspto.gov OR site:wipo.int patent OR trademark => p? => c? => c{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} license OR acquisition => p? => c? => brute{"{person}"} patent OR IP portfolio => =?

chains.name: Vehicles, Aircraft, and Vessels Trace
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} site:faa.gov aircraft => brute{"subject"} site:caa.co.uk aircraft => brute{"subject"} Lloyd's Register vessel => brute{"subject"} yacht OR superyacht => p? => c? => c{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} flag OR registration => a? => =? => brute{"{person}"} AIS OR flight track OR port call

domain_intelligence_workflows._description: Deep domain and link intelligence workflows

chains.name: Complete Domain Investigation
chains.syntax: whois? :{domain} => ?bl :!{domain} => ?ol :!{domain} => ga? :!{domain} => pdf! :!{domain} => p? => c? => puk: => cuk: => c? => ?bl :! => =? => 2010-2025! :!{domain} => ent? => =? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR scam

chains.name: Backlink Network Deep Analysis
chains.syntax: ?bl :!{domain} => whois? : => ga? :! => =? => c? => cuk: => brute{"{person}"} partnership OR acquisition => ?bl :! => =? => ent? :! => =?

chains.name: Subdomain Discovery and Investigation
chains.syntax: brutesite:{domain} -www => ?ol : => whois? : => ga? :! => =? => ent? :! => p? => c? => puk: => cuk: => =?

chains.name: Full Company Compliance Screening
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => p? => c? => sanctions? => sanctions? => sanctions? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} PEP OR politically exposed OR minister => reg{jur}: {company} => lituk: => lituk: => brute{"{company}"} enforcement OR penalty OR fine site:fca.org.uk OR site:sec.gov => brute{"{company}"} fraud OR investigation news! => 2015-2025! :!{domain} => ent? => =?

chains.name: Full Person Compliance Screening
chains.syntax: p{jur}: {person} => sanctions? {person} => brute{"{person}"} PEP OR minister OR politician gov! => p? => sanctions? => c? => sanctions? => reg{jur}: => lituk: {person} => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR arrest OR charged news! => brute{"{person}"} bankruptcy OR debt => c? => sanctions?

chains.name: Enhanced KYC Compliance Chain
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} PEP OR minister OR gov! => c? => c{jur}: => sanctions? => p? => sanctions?2_DIRECTORS => reg{jur}: {company} => brute{"{company}"} license OR authorized site:regulator => brute{"{company}"} fraud OR scam OR investigation news! => =?

chains.name: Enhanced AML Compliance Chain
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => c? => c? => c? => brute{"{person}"} shell OR nominee OR Panama Papers => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} money laundering OR FATF => c? => a? => =? => =?

pep_investigation_workflows._description: Politically Exposed Person deep investigation patterns

chains.name: Full PEP Investigation
chains.syntax: p{jur}: {person} => brute{"{person}"} minister OR politician OR MP OR senator gov! => p? => c? => c{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} government contract OR procurement => p? => c? => ass{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} OR "{person}" donation OR lobby OR corrupt => sanctions? {person} => sanctions? => =?

chains.name: PEP Family Network Investigation
chains.syntax: brute{"{person}"} wife OR husband OR son OR daughter OR brother OR sister OR parent => p? => p{jur}: => brute{""} site:linkedin.com => c? => c{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} government OR state OR public contract => ass{jur}: => brute{"{person}"} luxury OR yacht OR mansion OR wealth => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} corrupt OR investigation

chains.name: PEP Procurement Connection Trace
chains.syntax: brute{"pep_name"} OR "{person}" government contract OR tender OR procurement => c? => c{jur}: => p? => =? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR corruption OR investigation => ?bl :! => whois? : => =? => brute{"{person}"} offshore OR shell OR nominee

chains.name: Multi-Jurisdiction Company Investigation
chains.syntax: cuk: {company} => cde: {company} => cfr: {company} => cnl: {company} => cat: {company} => cch: {company} => c? => c{jur}: => p? => sanctions? => p{jur}: => c? => =? => a? => =? => brute{"{company}"} OR "{person}" fraud OR investigation news!

chains.name: Multi-Jurisdiction Person Investigation
chains.syntax: puk: {person} => pde: {person} => pfr: {person} => pnl: {person} => p{at}: {person} => p{ch}: {person} => p{se}: {person} => c? => c{jur}: => p? => =? => sanctions? {person} => sanctions? => ass{jur}: {person} => lituk: {person} => litde: {person} => litfr: {person} => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR arrest news!

chains.name: Multi-Jurisdiction Group Structure Trace
chains.syntax: c{jur}: parent_{company} => c? => cuk: => cde: => cfr: => cnl: => cat: => cch: => c? => p? => =? => sanctions? => c? => a? => =?

chains.name: Cross-Jurisdiction Disclosure Arbitrage
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => brute{"{company}"} annual report OR filing site:.gov OR site:registry => pdf! => ent? => c? => p? => c{jur}: => =? => brute{"{person}"} hidden OR unreported

historical_temporal_workflows._description: Time-based investigation patterns using archive and historical data

chains.name: Entity Evolution Over Time
chains.syntax: 2010! :!{domain} => 2015! :!{domain} => 2020! :!{domain} => 2025! :!{domain} => ent? => p? => c? => =? => p? => p? => c? => c? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} fraud OR investigation => =?

chains.name: Ownership Change Timeline
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => pdf! :!{domain} => ent? => c? => p? => =? => p? => p? => sanctions? => brute{"{person}"} sale OR divestment OR investigation => 2010-2025! :!{domain} => ent?

chains.name: Crisis Event Timeline Investigation
chains.syntax: brute{"subject"} fraud OR scandal OR investigation news! => =? => 2019! :!{domain} => 2020! :!{domain} => 2021! :!{domain} => ent? => ent? => =? => p? => c? => brute{"{person}"} new position OR new {company} => c{jur}:

network_mapping_workflows._description: Complex relationship and network mapping patterns

chains.name: Full Corporate Network Mapping
chains.syntax: c{jur}: {company} => p? => p? => c? => c? => c? => c? => c{jur}: => c{jur}: => p?2_DIRECTORS => c?2_DIRECTOR_COMPANIES => =? => a? => =? => ?bl :! => ga? :! => =? => =?

chains.name: Full Person Network Mapping
